name: GIGAFALL
description:
simply one click shooting game is here!

Now you become a EDF trainer and fight against the Apocalypse.

Only single click to Shoot a Laser Beam, and destroy the massive Meteors!!

LeftClick:Shot laser Beam

In the menu, Shot the icon to start the game mode you shot.

If in the Play, you can shoot the meteor to BRAKE them all and DEFEND the earth(HP:3).

Hope to enojoy it and also I welcome to your feedback.

Good luck.

  kowato:Japanese indie game creator.(Twitter: @kowato_poppo)

....but also is a student.

The GIGAFALL is developed for SmartPhone Game.

And its succses to appear in AppStore and GooglePlayStore so on. 

Now this is keep in Developing game.

Makes it More Good game if you want, please give me Feed back
(or some donate is might be more easy way to support me lol....)

Any way. Enjoy it.
